mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.zhuyuan_id AS "zhuyuanId", a.patient_id AS "patientId", a.doctor_id AS "doctorId", a.grouptype AS "grouptype", a.shenqingshijian AS "shenqingshijian", a.bingqingzhaiyao AS "bingqingzhaiyao", a.huizhenliyou AS "huizhenliyou", a.huizhenyijian AS "huizhenyijian", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.fabuflag AS "fabuflag", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO electron_group_consultation( id, zhuyuan_id, patient_id, doctor_id, grouptype, shenqingshijian, bingqingzhaiyao, huizhenliyou, huizhenyijian, create_date, update_date, create_by, update_by, fabuflag, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{zhuyuanId}, #{patientId}, #{doctorId}, #{grouptype}, #{shenqingshijian}, #{bingqingzhaiyao}, #{huizhenliyou}, #{huizhenyijian}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate}, #{createBy.id}, #{updateBy.id}, #{fabuflag}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE electron_group_consultation SET zhuyuan_id = #{zhuyuanId}, patient_id = #{patientId}, doctor_id = #{doctorId}, grouptype = #{grouptype}, shenqingshijian = #{shenqingshijian}, bingqingzhaiyao = #{bingqingzhaiyao}, huizhenliyou = #{huizhenliyou}, huizhenyijian = #{huizhenyijian}, update_date = #{updateDate}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, fabuflag = #{fabuflag} WHERE id = #{id}
